block.p: LEAD: Mr. and Mrs. Edward L. Scott Jr. of Short Hills, N.J., have announced September wedding plans for their daughter, Penelope Ann Scott, and Philip Alexander Moss, a son of Mrs. Roland C. Sherrer Jr. of Salzburg, Austria, and New York, and Peter Bayard Moss of Chestertown, Md.

LEAD: Mr. and Mrs. Edward L. Scott Jr. of Short Hills, N.J., have announced September wedding plans for their daughter, Penelope Ann Scott, and Philip Alexander Moss, a son of Mrs. Roland C. Sherrer Jr. of Salzburg, Austria, and New York, and Peter Bayard Moss of Chestertown, Md.

Mr. and Mrs. Edward L. Scott Jr. of Short Hills, N.J., have announced September wedding plans for their daughter, Penelope Ann Scott, and Philip Alexander Moss, a son of Mrs. Roland C. Sherrer Jr. of Salzburg, Austria, and New York, and Peter Bayard Moss of Chestertown, Md.
Miss Scott, known as Penny, graduated from the University of California at Los Angeles. She is a vice president of E. L. Scott & Company, a commodity brokerage headed by her father in New York.

Mr. Moss, a graduate of the New York Military Academy and Norwich University, is a commodity floor broker at the New York Cotton Exchange. His father is the president of Northside Sales, a cosmetics and perfume manufacturers' sales agency in Chestertown.
